import React, { useEffect, useState } from "react"; import usePlayers from "../../hooks/skrallgaming/usePlayers"; import Navbar from "../../components/navigation/skrallgaming/Navbar"; import "../../assets/style/skrallgaming/playerlist.css" export default function Calculator(){ const { players } = usePlayers() const [ pRating , SetPRating ] = useState([undefined, undefined, undefined, undefined]) const FindPlayer = (id, playerName) => { const player = players.find(player => player.name === playerName) let newPRating = [...pRating] newPRating[id] = player.rating SetPRating(newPRating) } const playerOptions = () => { console.log("Players", players) return( <> { players.map(player => ( )) } ) } return <>

Team 1:

Rating:{pRating[0]} Main:
Rating:{pRating[1]} Main:

Avg Rating: {(pRating[0] + pRating[1]) / 2}

Team 2:

Rating:{pRating[2]} Main:
Rating:{pRating[3]} Main:

Avg Rating:

{/*
Won games by team 1:










*/}
}
